I20031202

Open With> In Place Editor

This is the correct behaviour - the OLE widget cannot initialize and you get 
the error editor.

I guess I don't fully understand.
Why the log message?
How does the user make this work?

The issue with OLE is that it only works for file types that the OLE control 
handels without an error - we have no control over what the OLE support gives 
us from the OS.
